title: Watcher of Realms Tier List
description: The ultimate guide to the best heroes in Watcher of Realms. This tier list ranks all of the heroes from S Tier to C Tier based on their overall performance in various game modes.
heading: Watcher of Realms Tier List
introText: Watcher of Realms is a fantasy RPG that combines the intricate strategy of tower defense with classic role-playing elements. With a diverse roster of over 170 heroes across 10 factions, each with unique abilities, the game offers a deep and rewarding experience for players of all skill levels. However, with so many heroes to choose from, it can be difficult to know which ones are the best. That's where this tier list comes in. I've ranked all of the heroes in Watcher of Realms into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier based on their overall performance in various game modes, including PvE, PvP, and Guild Wars.
